EmailTemplate.description: Use to promote the mobile applications to end users of GM Audio
EmailTemplate.name: GlobalMeet-Mobile Apps for Audio Users
EmailTemplate.subject: Need to host meetings on-the-go?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
http://www.pgi.com
MEETINGS ON-THE-GO YOU'RE BUSY – SO WE MADE MEETINGS SIMPLE
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Need flexible meeting options for the way you work? With GlobalMeet you can meet at your desk or on-the-go with our GlobalMeet mobile apps. http://pages.pgi-email.com/gm-web-tools/
With GlobalMeet Mobile Apps you can:
- Start, schedule and join your meeting directly from your mobile device - Host, record and present directly from your iPad - Have the meeting call you with GlobalMeet's 'Connect Me' feature Don't let meetings keep you down – now you can break the chain from your desk and meet when and where you want.
Have Questions?
Contact me today – I'd be more than happy to answer any questions you may have.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Email}
{!User.Phone}
http://www.pgi.com
